Blog.post: Why me? I never bothered anyne... so Brandt pulls a wire in his freaking truck and asks me to fix it, ok, then he gets in trouble and tries to use me as a shield, and now mom wants me to ask dad for a cigarette...I miss Holly, I'm definatley calling her tomorrow to come pick me up from this crap house....

Post anything that you want. Anything at all. A story, a memory, a thought, a secret, a confession, a fear, a love, a song, a question you want me to answer, you can tell me what you think of me, or something random on your mind - anything. Be sure to post anonymously and honestly. Post twice, or as many times that you'd like, and then cut & paste this into your LJ to see what your friends have to say.

ok, so in my last post I asked abot the alphabets binary numbering used in keyboards, I'm not greatly disappointed in this but the folloing I learned, "each 26 letters (capitalized mind you) is given a decimal number, ok , now here's the simplicity that kills us all, it's A is 1 Z would be 26, so A= 00001, Z=the computer reads=11010, blah frustrating to me, figure it out yourselfs, MY FRUSTRATION AT SIMPLICITY!

I really like Lauren and Holly, but why must they drink dr. pepper? DR PEPPER FOR GOD'S SAKE!!. Oh well, yeah, I still like them and they're cool, I'm ann odd little person, I have no reason for being on the computer, I mean I reveiwed binary today, so now I'm going to be like I am 010000[oh, one, oh, oh, oh, oh ] years old, only putting that oh in phront so that people will realize it's in binary. My next step is to learn what a computer reads when you push each key,..anybody happen to have alist of that just lying around? HAHAHA, wow, victoria just IMed me, maybe she's only partway mad at me now...okie well off to go look up what B equals in binary HAHAHA later

I need some coke, bad, I'm thisty, and want some coke, yeah, I hate driving, at least with my parents, one is screaming for me to go fater, the other to go slower, there's no median, well there is but not in speed, just one to not hit... and yeah,.. I'm going to a concert tomorow with Lauren, Holly, and some other people, then Saturday I am to go and see Anchorman with Holly, fine then... NOW WHERE is some freaking coke! All in all, It's just another brick in the wall....

Yeah, so I finally decided who I'm gunna ask out, yeah, that's right, Holly, now to actually do it. Boy that's a diffrent story. Get on soon Lauren or I can't really do anything about it but yeah. Oh and now on to important matters. I watched "What Dreams May Come" and wow. My brother said it was boring and confusing, it was deep, and like it touched me and suff. Yeah, I hate to admit it but I almost cried, if they hadn't started being happy the very next second, I would have cried... Fights between dads and sons do thtat to me... yeah... bt seriously, yeah I almost cried. so yeah, how many times have I said yeah in this one post, I feel kinda dumb now...yeah...lol Later girls and cute guys j/k. someone punch me, NOW

01. Who are you, what's our relationship: 02. How and where did we meet: 03. What's my middle name: 04. How long have you known me: 05. Tell me one good thing about myself: 06. When you first saw me what was your impression: 07. Have you ever had a crush on me: 08. Do you remember one of the 1st things I said to you: 09. Describe me in 3 words: 10. Do you think i'm good looking(be honest): 11. How would you describe me to someone: 12. Would you ever date me: 13. Tell me one thing you've always wanted to say but never did: 14: What do you like most about me: 15: If we could spend a day together what would we do: 16: Have we ever gotten in a fight: 17: Do you think we will be friends for at least 3 or 4 more years: 18. Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it. 19. What do you think my weakness is? 20. What makes me happy? 21. What makes me sad? 22. What reminds you of me? 23. If you could give me anything what would it be? 24. When's the last time you saw me? 25. What song (if any) reminds you of me? 26. If you could change one thing about me, what would it be? 27. Would you make a move on me? 28. Do I cross your mind at least 1 time a day? mm, comment or e-mail to me when done, I know it's kinda gay, but humor me, or DIE, MUAHAHAHAHA

So yeah, today was pretty boring, I finished a model rocket, well almost, since I want to make my own decals for this baby, I've gota get my printer to work. I also went to Wal-Mart and I picked up my pictures from Gschool, now to figure out this scanner deal,...oooh that crazy Logan dressed up as a chick and that crazy me taped to a wall...yeah. Oh, and our AC is broken and it's only 98 deg. F here. hmmm, what else can I talk about, I guess nothing. okie,

so it seems like the new cool thing to start these blog deals, so yeah, I hng out with Lauren from GSFTA and my new friend Holly. I miss everyone from GSFTA, cause theyre nicer to me than my family. I made my ex mad at me today cause I didn't want to spend all day witth her. mmm, yeah
